hanzi-su-wiki:
摘

Значения

Срывать, срезать, собирать; брать пальцами, щипать, подытоживать

Мнемоника

Запрет 商 на работу всей руки 扌. В деле лишь какая-то её часть, например, щепоть. Рвать пальцами.
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhāi
to take; to borrow; to pick (flowers, fruit etc); to pluck; to select; to remove; to take off (glasses, hat etc)
принять; одалживать; собирать (цветы, фрукты и т. д.); ощипывать; выбирать; удалять; снять (очки, шляпа и т. д.)

heisig_chinese_memo: My grandma always pinched me with her fingers when i was playing with her handpicked antiques. Imagine her fingers, also quite antique, thin, bony and hard, pinching at your hand. "Keep your fingers away from my handpicked antiques!!".
heisig_constituent: pinch, finger, fingers, antique, vase, stand up, hood, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth
Keyword_KANJIDIC: pinch, pick, pluck, trim, clip, summarize
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: ущипнуть, выбрать, срывать, дифферент, клип, обобщать
koohiiStory1: My grandma always pinched me with her fingers when i was playing with her antiques. Imagine her fingers, also quite antique, thin, bony and hard, pinching at your hand. "Keep your fingers away from my antiques!!".
koohiiStory2: >_< Don´t you hate when your aunt (who is an antique) PINCHES your cheeks with her antique fingers?
jp_example_words:
指摘(してき): pointing out, identification
摘む(つまむ): to pinch, to hold, to pick up
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Stick your fingers in your mohawk and pluck each hair out, one by one.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine plucking the hairs out of your mohawk with your fingers. It's kind of hard to grab onto them at first, but eventually you're plucking them like it's nothing.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You want to pluck all your mohawk hair out because you're a techie (てき), and everyone at your techie job keeps making fun of you for your hair choices. "Techies should be bald!" your boss screamed. So here you are, plucking your hair out to fit in.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You didn't realize techies were so inclusive... but they just plucked and plucked at your self-esteem, until you decided to pluck your hair out of your own head.
Ru_Meaning: pinch, pick, pluck, trim, clip, summarize

Ru_trainchinese: zhāi: (глаг) снимать, собирать; отбирать, делать выдержки из; ругать, делать выговор; (разг.) занимать деньги (на срочные нужды)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (扌) of the old trader (啇) plucks
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: My grandma always pinched me with her fingers when i was playing with her handpicked antiques. Imagine her fingers, also quite antique, thin, bony and hard, pinching at your hand. "Keep your fingers away from my handpicked antiques!!".
humanum_full_description_en:
Same as " 𢴨 ", from the sound of " hand " and "啻", the original meaning is to pick or remove with fingers. "Shuowen": "Extend the fruit tree. From the hand, the sound. One said: refers to the near." Duan Yucai's note: "Extension of everything he takes is also called to pick." Southern Song Xie Lingyun "Preliminary Wei Taizi Ye "In the Poems of the Central Works‧ Pingyuan Hou Zhi": "Climb the branches and pick the cymbidium."

" Summary " can mean selection and extraction. Han Caiyong "The Stele of Langyan King Fu Caijun": "Performing the filial piety, cherishing literary and artistic talents, including cave classics, and publishing secrets."

" Digest " also means to criticize and blame. "Wen Xuan-Fu Yi "Dancing Fu"": "Pick the ranks together, and manage the business." Li Shan's note: "Point out the ranks and make them neat."

" Pick " can also mean to remove or remove. "Liu Zhiyuan's Tune in the Palaces-Reunion of the Brothers and Couples of Monarchs and Ministers": "Zhuo took the sword and took the bow and arrow."
humanum_short_description_en: Same as " 𢴨 ", from the sound of " hand " and "啻", the original meaning is to pick or take off with your fingers.
humanum_full_description:
同「𢴨」，從「手」，「啻」聲，本義為用手指采下或取下。《說文》：「拓果樹實也。从手，啻聲。一曰：指近之也。」段玉裁注：「引申之凡他取亦曰摘。」 南朝宋謝靈運《擬魏太子鄴中集詩‧平原侯植》：「傾柯引弱枝，攀條摘蕙草。」

　　「摘」可表示選取、抽取。漢蔡邕〈琅玡王傅蔡君碑〉：「履孝弟之性，懷文藝之才，包洞典籍，刊摘沈秘。」

　　「摘」亦表示指摘、責備。《文選‧傅毅〈舞賦〉》：「摘齊行列，經營切儗。」李善注：「指摘行列，使之齊整。」

　　「摘」還可表示除去、去掉。《劉知遠諸宮調‧君臣兄弟夫婦團圓》：「卓下剛刀，摘了弓箭。」
humanum_short_description: 同「𢴨」，從「手」，「啻」聲，本義為用手指采下或取下。

摘字的基本解释

摘
zhāi
采取，拿下：采摘。摘取。摘桃子。摘除。
选取：摘要。摘录。摘编。文摘。摘引。寻章摘句。指摘（挑出缺点）。
借：摘兑。东摘西借。
戴

摘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhāi］
［《廣韻》陟革切，入麥，知。］
亦作“擿3”。
(1)用手指采下或取下。
(2)指用手轻拉。
(3)除去，去掉。
(4)选取；抽取。
(5)指摘要。
(6)指摘，责备。
(7)借贷。参见“摘借”。
(8)信服。参见“摘伏”。
[②]［tì］
［《廣韻》他歷切，入錫，透。］
(1)发，开发。
(2)揭发。
(3)扰乱。
(4)用手指拨弄弦索乐器。
(5)剔，挑。
[③]［zhì］
即搔头。妇女首饰的一种。

摘字的英文翻译

◎ 摘
cull, pack, plunk, select

摘字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摘； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页449第32
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他歷切，音剔。【說文】拓果樹實也。一曰指近之也。【傅毅·舞賦】摘齊行列。【註】指摘行列。使整齊也。　又【廣韻】發也，動也。【元稹詩】共邀連榻坐，兼去摘船行。【自註】音剔。　又【唐韻】竹厄切【集韻】【韻會】陟革切，?音謫。手取也。【唐書·建寧王倓傳】天后次子賢作歌曰：種瓜黃臺下，瓜熟子離離。一摘使瓜好，再摘令瓜稀。三摘尚云可，四摘抱蔓歸。或作擿。

采取，取下；选取；指责，批评；借。

Basic explanation of words
Pick
zhāi
Take, take: pick. Pick. Pick peaches. Remove.
Select: Summary. extract. Excerpts. Digest. quote. Search chapter extract sentence. Accusations (picking out shortcomings).
Borrow: pick up. Pick from the east and borrow the west.
wore
Pick
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhāi］
["Guangyun" Zhige cut, enter the wheat, know. ]
Also known as "擿3".
(1) Pick or remove with fingers.
(2) Finger pull with hand.
(3) Remove and remove.
(4) Selection; extraction.
(5) Refers to abstract.
(6) Accusation, blame.
(7) Borrowing. See "Extract".
(8) Convinced. See "pick up".
[②]［tì］
["Guangyun" he cuts through, enters the tin, and penetrates. ]
(1) Distribution and development.
(2) Disclosure.
(3) Disturbance.
(4) Use your fingers to flick the stringed instrument.
(5) Picky, picky.
[③]［zhì］
That is, scratch your head. A kind of women's jewelry.

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? He is thorough, and the sound is cut. [Said the text] Extending fruit trees for real. One said that it is near. 【Fu Yi·Dancing Fu】Get together. [Note] Refers to the ranks. Make it neat also.　[Guangyun] again, it’s done, it’s moving too. 【Yuan Zhen Poetry】A total of invited guests to sit on the couch and go picking the boat. [Self-note] sound tick.　 [Tang Yun] Zhu Erqi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhi Ge cut,? Hand fetch also. [Book of Tang·The Biography of King Jianning] The second son of the Queen of Heaven wrote a song and said: Plant melons under the stage, and ripe melons are separated. Pick it to make the melon good, then pick the melon to be thin. Three picks are still clouds, four picks and embraces vines. Or as Zhuo.

Конг Шу (#), печать печати имеет форму руки, что означает собирание руками; Конг Джи, наступит прекращение роста, плод перестанет расти, когда он созреет, и тогда вы сможете собирать и есть.

zhāi
I гл.
1) собирать, срывать, снимать; выщипывать
摘梨 рвать груши
把眼镜摘下来 снять очки
摘星 срывать звёзды (обр. о высоком пике, здании)
2) отбирать, делать выборки (извлечения)
从诗集里摘了几首精彩的 выбрать из сборника стихов несколько наиболее совершенных
3) перебирать, пощипывать (напр. струны)
立搊卧摘 стоя перебирать (лады), лёжа пощипывать (струны)
4) указывать пальцем; вскрывать, разоблачать
摘齐行 (háng) 列 выровнять строй мановением руки
5) брать взаймы, занимать
摘了几个钱买书 занять денег на покупку книг
6) * провоцировать на беспорядки, сеять смуту
东摘濊貊 на востоке вызвать смуту племени вэймо
II сущ.
извлечение; компиляция
旧摘 старинная компиляция
Radicals: 扌, 啇  (fingers, mohawk)
Meaning Mnemonic
Stick your fingers in your mohawk and pluck each hair out, one by one.
Imagine plucking the hairs out of your mohawk with your fingers. It's kind of hard to grab onto them at first, but eventually you're plucking them like it's nothing.
Reading Mnemonic
You want to pluck all your mohawk hair out because you're a techie (てき), and everyone at your techie job keeps making fun of you for your hair choices. "Techies should be bald!" your boss screamed. So here you are, plucking your hair out to fit in.
You didn't realize techies were so inclusive... but they just plucked and plucked at your self-esteem, until you decided to pluck your hair out of your own head.
